segments.text: Hi , Mr . Smith . This is Mary . Is Jenny there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I ’ m afraid not , Mary . May I take a message for her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please tell her that band practice has been moved to Tuesday night at eight thirty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . No problem . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but if she has any questions , she can call me at 555-2345 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , I ’ ll leave her the message , Mary . Thanks for calling .
segments.speaker: S1
